    • getSchedule

      public static List<Slot> getSchedule(User user, LocalDate timeStart, LocalDate timeEnd)
      Take a user(Student or Professor) and two LocalDate(start/end) and return every slot that the user is in in the timerange of the two LocalDate The user must be persisted or will return an empty array
      Parameters:
      user - a persisted User
      timeStart - the start of the timerange
      timeEnd - the end of the timerange
      Returns:
      a List of slot that is in the timerange and with the Groups of the User

    • getSchedule

      public static List<Slot> getSchedule(Student student, LocalDate timeStart, LocalDate timeEnd)
      Take a student and two LocalDate(start/end) and return every slot that the student is in in the timerange of the two LocalDate The student must be persisted or will return an empty array
      Parameters:
      student - a persisted Student
      timeStart - the start of the timerange
      timeEnd - the end of the timerange
      Returns:
      a List of slot that is in the timerange and with the Groups of the Student

    • getSchedule

      public static List<Slot> getSchedule(Group group, LocalDate timeStart, LocalDate timeEnd)
      Take a Group and two LocalDate(start/end) and return every slot that the group is in, in the timerange of the two LocalDate The group must be persisted or will return an empty array
      Parameters:
      group - a persisted group
      timeStart - the start of the timerange
      timeEnd - the end of the timerange
      Returns:
      a List of slot that is in the timerange with this group

    • updateInSchedule

      public static boolean updateInSchedule(Slot oldSlot, Slot newSlot)
      Take two slot and update the first by the second if the first one is not in the database, the methode will fail
      Parameters:
      oldSlot - the old slot, persisted
      newSlot - the new one, not yet persisted
      Returns:
      true if failure false if it's a success

    • addGroupInSchedule

      public static Group addGroupInSchedule(String formation, int year)
      Take one String and an Int and return a persisted Group with the right format The year is comprised beteween 0 and 4 0 is L1 and 4 is M2 if the value is not correct is will be ignored if group is failed to be persisted it will return an empty Group eg:(informAtique,5) -> M2 Informatique
      Parameters:
      formation -
      year -
      Returns:
